title: Rock Feast
n_1: Neil and Buzz, dressed as astronauts, examine rocks in a space-themed exhibit.
c2_1: Indeed, but how does it taste?
n_2: Buzz pretends to taste a rock, looking thoughtful.
c1_2: Imagine if we could eat them!
n_3: Neil laughs, ready with a witty reply.
n_4: Neil delivers the punchline with a smirk.
